verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Passing On <S%G3855><s%> He Saw <S%G1492><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Birth. <S%G1079><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Asked <S%G2065><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Sinned, <S%G264><s%> This Man <S%G3778><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1118><s%> His Parents, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> He Should Be Born? <S%G1080><s%>

Answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> This Man <S%G3778><s%> Sinned <S%G264><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Parents <S%G1118><s%> His; <S%G846><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Should Be Manifested <S%G5319><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Me <S%G1691><s%> It Behooves <S%G1163><s%> To Work <S%G2038><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Of Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Sent <S%G3992><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> While <S%G2193><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> It Is; <S%G2076><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> Night, <S%G3571><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> To Work. <S%G2038><s%>
While <S%G3752><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> I May Be, The <S%G5600><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> I Am <S%G1510><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> World. <S%G2889><s%>

These Things <S%G5023><s%> Having Said, <S%G2036><s%> He Spat <S%G4429><s%> On The Ground, <S%G5476><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> Clay <S%G4081><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spittle, <S%G4427><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Applied <S%G2025><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Clay <S%G4081><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eyes <S%G3788><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> , Blind Man. <S%G5185><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Go, <S%G5217><s%> Wash <S%G3538><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pool <S%G2861><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Siloam, <S%G4611><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is Interpreted, <S%G2059><s%> Sent. <S%G649><s%> He Went <S%G565><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Washed, <S%G3538><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> Seeing. <S%G991><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Neighbours <S%G1069><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Saw <S%G2334><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Before <S%G4386><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> He Was, <S%G2258><s%> Said, <S%G3004><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Was Sitting <S%G2521><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Begging? <S%G4319><s%>
They Said <S%G3004><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Were Opened <S%G455><s%> Thine <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eyes? <S%G3788><s%>

Answered <S%G611><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Clay <S%G4081><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Applied To <S%G2025><s%> Mine <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eyes, <S%G3788><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Said <S%G2036><s%> To Me, <S%G3427><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pool <S%G2861><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Siloam <S%G4611><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wash : <S%G3538><s%> Having Gone <S%G565><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Washed <S%G3538><s%> I Received Sight. <S%G308><s%>
They Said <S%G2036><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> He? <S%G1565><s%> He Says, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Know Not. <S%G1492><s%>
They Bring <S%G71><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Once Was <S%G4218><s%> Blind. <S%G5185><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> Now It Was <S%G1161><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Clay <S%G4081><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Opened <S%G455><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eyes. <S%G3788><s%>

Again <S%G3825><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Asked <S%G2065><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> He Received Sight. <S%G308><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Clay <S%G4081><s%> He Put <S%G2007><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788><s%> Mine Eyes, <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Washed, <S%G3538><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I See. <S%G991><s%>

Said <S%G3004><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Some, <S%G5100><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G2076><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Does Not Keep. <S%G5083><s%> Others <S%G243><s%> Said, <S%G3004><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Can <S%G1410><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> A Sinner <S%G268><s%> Such <S%G5108><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> Do? <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Division <S%G4978><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

They Say <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Blind Man <S%G5185><s%> Again, <S%G3825><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Sayest <S%G3004><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> He Opened <S%G455><s%> Thine <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eyes? <S%G3788><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2036><s%> Said, <S%G3754><s%> A Prophet <S%G4396><s%> He Is. <S%G2076><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> Did Not Believe <S%G4100><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Received Sight, <S%G308><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G3755><s%> They Called <S%G5455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parents <S%G1118><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Had Received Sight. <S%G308><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Asked <S%G2065><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> Your Son, <S%G5216><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Say <S%G3004><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> He Was Born? <S%G1080><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Now <S%G737><s%> Does He See? <S%G991><s%>

Answered <S%G611><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1118><s%> His Parents <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> We Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> Our Son, <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> He Was Born; <S%G1080><s%>

<S%G4459><s%> But How <S%G1161><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> He Sees <S%G991><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Know Not, <S%G1492><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Opened <S%G455><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eyes <S%G3788><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Know Not; <S%G1492><s%> He <S%G846><s%> <S%G2244><s%> Is Of Age, <S%G2192><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Ask, <S%G2065><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Himself <S%G848><s%> Shall Speak. <S%G2980><s%>

These Things <S%G5023><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Parents <S%G1118><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> They Feared <S%G5399><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews; <S%G2453><s%> <S%G2235><s%> For Already <S%G1063><s%> Had Agreed Together <S%G4934><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Should Confess To Be The <S%G3670><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Put Out Of The Synagogue <S%G656><s%> He Should Be. <S%G1096><s%>

Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Parents <S%G1118><s%> His <S%G846><s%> , <S%G2036><s%> Said, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G2244><s%> He Is Of Age, <S%G2192><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Ask. <S%G2065><s%>

They Called <S%G5455><s%> <S%G3767><s%> Therefore <S%G1537><s%> A Second Time <S%G1208><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Blind, <S%G5185><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God; <S%G2316><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> A Sinner <S%G268><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

Answered <S%G611><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> A Sinner <S%G268><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Know Not. <S%G1492><s%> One Thing <S%G1520><s%> I Know, <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> Now <S%G737><s%> I See. <S%G991><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And They Said <S%G1161><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> , Again, <S%G3825><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Did He <S%G4160><s%> To Thee? <S%G4671><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Opened He <S%G455><s%> Thine <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eyes? <S%G3788><s%>

He Answered <S%G611><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> I Told <S%G2036><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Already, <S%G2235><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Did Not Hear : <S%G191><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Do Ye Wish <S%G2309><s%> <S%G191><s%> To Hear? <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Also <S%G5210><s%> Do Ye Wish <S%G2309><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> To Become? <S%G1096><s%>

They Railed At <S%G3058><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> Disciple <S%G3101><s%> His, <S%G1565><s%> <S%G2249><s%> But We <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Moses <S%G3475><s%> Are <S%G2070><s%> Disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

We <S%G2249><s%> Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> To Moses <S%G3475><s%> Has Spoken <S%G2980><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> <S%G5126><s%> But This Man <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Know Not <S%G1492><s%> Whence <S%G4159><s%> He Is. <S%G2076><s%>

Answered <S%G611><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Indeed <S%G1063><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> A Wonderful Thing <S%G2298><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Know Not <S%G1492><s%> Whence <S%G4159><s%> He Is, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Opened <S%G455><s%> Mine <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eyes. <S%G3788><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> But We Know <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Does Not Hear; <S%G191><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> God Fearing <S%G2318><s%> Be, <S%G5600><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> Do, <S%G4160><s%> Him <S%G5127><s%> He Hears. <S%G191><s%>

<S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ever <S%G165><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Was Not Heard <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Opened <S%G455><s%> Anyone The <S%G5100><s%> Eyes <S%G3788><s%> Of One Blind <S%G5185><s%> Having Been Born. <S%G1080><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> This Man <S%G3778><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Could <S%G1410><s%> Do <S%G4160><s%> Nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

They Answered <S%G611><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Sins <S%G266><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Wast Born <S%G1080><s%> Wholly, <S%G3650><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Teachest <S%G1321><s%> Us? <S%G2248><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Cast <S%G1544><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Out. <S%G1854><s%>

Heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> They Cast <S%G1544><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Out, <S%G1854><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Found <S%G2147><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Believest <S%G4100><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God? <S%G2316><s%>

Answered <S%G611><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Is He, <S%G2076><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> I May Believe <S%G4100><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G1161><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> Thou Hast Seen <S%G3708><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Speaks <S%G2980><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G5346><s%> I Believe, <S%G4100><s%> Lord : <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Worshipped <S%G4352><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Judgment <S%G2917><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Into 1519 PREP 3588 T-ASM 2889 N-ASM This World 5126 D-ASM Came, 2064 V-2AAI-1S That 2443 CONJ 3588 T-NPM They That 3361 PRT-N See Not 991 V-PAP-NPM Might See, 991 V-PAS-3P And 2532 CONJ They That 3588 T-NPM See 991 V-PAP-NPM Blind 5185 A-NPM Might Become. 1096 V-2ADS-3P

And <S%G2532><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Were <S%G5607><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Him, <S%G3361><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> Are? <S%G2070><s%>

Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> <S%G2258><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Were, <S%G302><s%> Ye Would Not Have <S%G2192><s%> Sin; <S%G266><s%> <S%G3568><s%> But Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Ye Say <S%G3754><s%> We See, <S%G991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> Remains. <S%G3306><s%>
